availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Horace Buckner Gentry (Warren County, Kentucky, tailor)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, tailor. Kentucky native. Son of Haden Gentry and Harriet Jane Carson Gentry. Married to Martha Elizabeth Young Gentry in Christian County, Kentucky, in May 1858. Father of Horace R. Gentry. Student in Christian County in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Christian County in 1850. Tailor in Warren County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p.486B.

Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, 1857-1875, Film #000465564, p. 12.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Todd County Marriages, 1820-1886, Film #000367186, p. 97.
